product_name: The North Face Isotherm Shirt - Men's
long_description: Prepare for challenging cross-country ski workouts in The North Face Isotherm shirt. It uses a warm blend of merino wool fabric and FlashDry(TM) fibers to regulate your core temperature. Blend of merino wool, polyolefin and polyester fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly and offers light insulation for the cold. Panels with wicking FlashDry(TM) fibers wrap around the sides, down the center back and under the arms for exceptional moisture management. The body-mapped construction provides lightweight warmth without sacrificing breathability. Athlete tested and competition proven, The North Face Isotherm half-zip jacket for men is part of the Flight Series(R) collection. Reflective logo.
